post.body: the boys skool ~ christmas party day Ho Ho Ho!
Carabba'z w/ my Mrs.
'House-husband' 2day: laundry, washing dishes, bagging lvs, hangin' w/ Gav... 7 yrs til he's 18. Miss him already... These R the good days
New blog post: Christmas Confession: I crank the A/C down to build a fire http://tinyurl.com/95o3up
Hey all u scavenger hunters - bring all Carl's 'vitamins' to him @ Bro. Wade's in Brockton (Grelot & Schillengers) ~ look 4 the cars.
New blog post: A New Christmas Tradition http://tinyurl.com/4jbzya
On my way to Elders Meeting @ Cracker Barrel.
Ahhhh a day off... I think I'll go to the dentist & refinance my house.
New blog post: Consider this a Christmas gift from us to you. :-) http://tinyurl.com/3t2waj
Ok... That was fun. Now on 2 Harvest Church
Gr8 Day! Good studies. / Check out the blogs. / Headed 2 play soccer 4 a few b/f church.
New blog post: The Relationship Filter http://tinyurl.com/3wtmsd
Boys 2 school; listened 2 Andrew Womack; @ the gym: the day has begun.
Men's Steak-Out rocked! One of the best ever...
Men's Steak-Out tonight @ my house. It will be like none other! 6:30 ~ c u there!
The chimney sweep came this morning.
New blog post: In the Name of Christmas http://tinyurl.com/59jszg
Been working from home today. About to do a quick cardio routine then run some errands.
New blog post: Confirmation of the Conception http://tinyurl.com/6fhzlz
Church was fun this morning. Now headed 2 a cr8ive mtg. kc
New blog post: How to Conceive YOUR Miracle http://tinyurl.com/59u3o8
God gave me gr8 unction 2day to speak on 'Order In Our Lives'; then lunch w/ the Brewsters (fine folk) & now NFL & a nap! :-)
Think I've got a touch of food poisoning. Got N2 some bad potato salad...it tasted good but not @ 3:30 this mornin'. FEEL like staying home.
The Tide Got Rolled!
Cabbage Bowl bound! (Nanna's house) :-)
2009 will be a year of fulfillment of dreams & prophesies! Peace to u & yours. pKc
Golfing w/ family & friends. Garrison is having a blast! Uncle Trent is teaching Brooklyn (& the rest of us too.) :-)
BEEN A GR8 HOLIDAY ~ HEADED TO THE OFFICE 4 A BIT TODAY.
ROCKIN' IT WITH THE IN-LAWS THIS AFTERNOON!
Gav sprayed my kid sisters new pepper spray (not knowing what it was) & CLEARED the house for 20 minutes! A CHRISTMAS 2 remember! :-)
Best Christmas ever! Pk & fam :-)
90 minutes til Christmas Eve Communion service @ Harvest Church!
Last minute shopping at.... Big Lots! :-)
Got the boys haircuts. Headed 2 Los for mexican food w/ he fam then back to the jungle 4 last min gift purchase.
New blog post: Photo Op of "Gourmet Dinner with Papa" http://tinyurl.com/8ugcn7
Addie 2 a ladies Christmas party so I'm doing a gourmet dinner 4 the boys. Pix & brief blog L8r.
New blog post: Life is a journey, & I believe Christmas a repose! http://tinyurl.com/9pc3uh
New blog post: My Favorite Christmas Song http://tinyurl.com/a2rj5y
We caught the cat that bit Gavin!
Do u live in an environment that pulls gr8ness out of u or tolerates your mediocrity? Job, church, friends... It all matters.
